list_definition.definition: to go to see (a person or place)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We visited my parents at the weekend
They visited the ruins at Pompeii while they were on holiday.

list_definition.definition: to stay in (a place) or with (a person) for a time

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Many birds visit (Britain) only during the summer months.

list_definition.mean_english: sự viếng thăm, sự ở chơi
list_definition.definition: an act of going to see someone or something for pleasure, socially, professionally etc, or going to stay for a time

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We went on a visit to my aunt’s
the children’s visit to the museum.
